programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After stumbling upon a cute cat-dog-rabbit creature hybrid, or 'Cadobbit', Ben ignores Grandpa Max's advice and sneaks the animal onto the Rustbucket, but is soon in over his head as it turns on him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Ben and Billy Billions go head-to-head over a Sumo Slammer Set sold exclusively inside the world's largest shopping centre, only to find six-year-old Simon Sez has gotten to it first.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Aboard the SS Pettigrew on its final voyage, Ben must battle seasickness as well as Steam Smythe, who looks to use his mechanical creatures to sink the steamship's modern replacement.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: With new Omni-Enhancements in tow, Ben plans on saving a town from a sudden mudslide, but his heroics are short-lived once Vilgax appears to warn him about the Omnitrix's mysterious new alien.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After discovering that Vilgax has joined forces with the Weatherheads, Ben must not only overcome his doubts, but must also fully embrace his new powers if he is to beat his foes.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: When their attempt to get a photo with every storefront mascot is foiled, Ben and Gwen sneak out to get a snap with a wooden bear totem known as 'Yawk' only to find all the mascots have come to life.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: When a cavity forces Ben to consult a dentist, his day gets worse when the mean magician Hex uses a dreamcatcher to bring Ben's fears to life and transports them both to a nightmarish dreamscape.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: When the Rustbucket must have a tune-up in the same town as Zombozo's latest campaign trail stop, Ben discovers the clown is using his speeches to hypnotise and rob the town.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: As the Tennysons dig up dinosaur fossils in the Badlands, Ben is unaware that Vilgax and Dr. Amino have teamed up to steal alien DNA from the Omnitrix. Vilgax then double-crosses his fellow villain.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: During a live feed of the new transcontinental bullet train, La Grange enters the picture to outrace the train, but Ben joins in on the fun and will stop at nothing to come out on top!

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: After Max dozes off before a double feature, Ben and Gwen are left to save the drive-in on their own when evil magician Hex brings the film monster 'That' to life and unleashes it on the cinemagoers.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen engage in a highly competitive paper airplane war, but when alien-tech drones bombard the Rustbucket, they must work together to foil the aerial attack and find out who's behind it.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: Ben takes a detour on a jungle cruise during a trip to Adrenaworld West and finds himself hunted by the evil Tim Buktu. Ben must outwit Tim Buktu if he wants to make it off the theme park ride alive.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2
programme.desc: The Tennyson trio uncovers Steam Smythe's steam-powered generator during a sightseeing trip at the Geyser Gulch National Park, and must shut it down before it overloads the power grid.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Captain is upset because all of his shiny gold coins have been painted grey. It's a disaster as far as the pirates are concerned! Noddy decides to investigate. He realises that the grey coins are actually the gold coin covered with paint. They're not the only things that have turned grey too – Deltoid's shiny gold medal has been painted grey too. After following all the clues, Noddy works out that the Naughticorns are the culprits! They were jealous of anything being shinier or more golden than their shiny gold horns! The Naughticorns apologise to the other toys and soon everyone has their shiny gold coins and medals back to normal again. Phew! Thank you, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang must rescue Stoick with assistance from… Berk’s archenemy Alvin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, “Bridges Aflame.” Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip finds out what Oh does all day while she's at school/Oh tries to change his good reputation by acting out

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: After fighting gets them stuck in a dangerous situation, enemies Skrap-It and Ton-Ton must join forces to save themselves.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is in an overly helpful mood and his other friends start to feel excluded… will Raa Raa realise the error of his ways and let the others help too?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Captain is upset because all of his shiny gold coins have been painted grey. It's a disaster as far as the pirates are concerned! Noddy decides to investigate. He realises that the grey coins are actually the gold coin covered with paint. They're not the only things that have turned grey too – Deltoid's shiny gold medal has been painted grey too. After following all the clues, Noddy works out that the Naughticorns are the culprits! They were jealous of anything being shinier or more golden than their shiny gold horns! The Naughticorns apologise to the other toys and soon everyone has their shiny gold coins and medals back to normal again. Phew! Thank you, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Welcome To Sudden Death
programme.desc: A former special forces officer working as a security guard battles a group of terrorists after they take hostages inside a basketball arena.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A pampered actor and his co-stars become part of a real war in a Southeast Asian jungle.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted
programme.desc: A hostage negotiator from the NYPD teams up with an FBI agent to save innocent lives when a cunning bank robber takes over the Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edward’s child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rover’s number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in post-apocalyptic 2018, John Connor is the man fated to lead the human resistance against Skynet and its army of Terminators. But the appearance of Marcus Wright changes everything.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: The world's foremost authority on structural security accepts a job to break out of an ultra-secret, high-tech facility. When he agrees, he is incarcerated in the most secret and secure prison on the planet—and no one knows it is just a test.

programme.title: Hard Target 2
programme.desc: Disgraced and retired mixed martial artist Wes “The Jailor” Baylor (Scott Adkins) couldn't refuse the million-dollar purse offered to fight in Myanmar.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: I'm Sorry My Love
programme.desc: In the hope of landing a job that will eventually enable her to pay for her sister’s operation, Tinay (Judy Ann Santos) leaves her small fishing village and heads for Manila.

programme.title: Manikang Papel
programme.desc: A woman every man wanted. A seductress every woman hated. Angela (Ynez Veneracion) is the most misunderstood woman in an old-fashioned town in Lubao, Pampanga.

programme.title: Tag-Init
programme.desc: One mystery envelops a group of friends who goes out on a vacation. Will they find the real criminal or be caught with their own mesh?

programme.title: Kambyo
programme.desc: A heartwarming story of four men, their friendship and a road trip that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Gandarrapiddo: The Revenger Squad
programme.desc: The Revenger Squad reveal their superpowers when one of their youngest turns twenty-one and receives his own powers.

programme.title: Won't Last A Day Without You
programme.desc: DJ Heidee (Sarah Geronimo) provides love advice to people who are having problems in their relationships. In the process of getting Melissa and Andrew together, Heidee begin to feel an attraction toward Andrew.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Itutumba Ka ng Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Teteng (Janno Gibbs), a single father and assistant to a film director, faces his last days due to a brain tumor. Despite his fear of confrontation, he becomes determined to protect his daughter from bullies.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Cruz
programme.desc: The story of Raffy (JC Santos) and Gela (Ryza Cenon) who find themselves taking off for Palawan to escape the not so great realities of their current lives and catch up on their respective me-time.

programme.title: Abay Babes
programme.desc: It tells the story of five girls who have been best friends since high school and are reunited for a wedding of the least attractive person in their group.

programme.title: A Cup of Flavor
programme.desc: When a cold and unfriendly "nomadic guy" unexpectedly falls in love with an ambitious and assertive coffee farmer, a significant decision has to be made to maintain their romantic relationship.

programme.title: Ang Cute Ng Ina Mo
programme.desc: The story revolves around Georgia,a Filipina patis manufacturer and a mother who is finally reunited with her long-lost daughter after 20 years of separation.

programme.title: Saan Nagtatago Ang Pag-ibig? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A marriage of convenience became a fulfilling relationship that eventually opened the eyes and hearts of everybody into the beautiful soul hidden inside the young man nobody wanted. Starring Vilma Santos, Tonton Gutierrez and Ricky Davao.

programme.title: Xenoa
programme.desc: General Norak is so hellbent on ruling Xenoa that he doesn't think twice about turning sibling against sibling in his quest for power.

programme.title: ALF S1 E20 - Going Out Of My Head Over You
programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: Cheers S3 E24 - Bells Of St. Clete's
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Cheers S3 E25 - Rescue Me (Wraparound Show)
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: CSI S4 E02 - All For Our Country
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: Frost arrives and changes the landscape, creating new obstacles for the participants. Some deal with the consequences of a diet with no diversity, while others battle with major shelter issues.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While the team searches for clues to understand why an ancient well was constructed on Lot 26, excitement abounds when more evidence of a tunnel heading directly towards the garden shaft is discovered.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: Are modern-day pirates prowling the Bermuda Triangle in search of victims? The team takes on the twisted case of a missing boat called the Saba Bank lost in the vicinity of the Bermuda Triangle in 1974.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team has secret intel on a wreck that might be a legendary 1930s disappearance: the champion racing yacht known as Ingomar. Lured by a light, the Ingomar's seasoned crew smashes into an obstacle.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: In the midst of the 1970s folk art movement, art student Martha Nelson creates a one-of-a-kind doll to sell at local Kentucky craft markets.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The Mutual UFO Network — better known as MUFON — is the world's leading organisation devoted to the scientific investigation of unidentified aerial phenomena and other unexplained encounters.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: A storm is headed for the swamp. Daniel faces the tempest head-on. Ronnie braves dangerous lightning. Ashley tries to outrun the rain while Leron and Porkchop wade right in.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)
programme.desc: Adam and Rob serve up their most annoying stings in the history of the Pain Index and chase them with a tiny fish that has venom to die for.

programme.title: The Art Of Washoku
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Japan's culinary heritage with this program celebrating the beauty of washoku—Japanese cuisine. Explore the kaiseki ryori, a multi-course meal inspired by the changing seasons.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: Relics from the crucifixion of Jesus Christ have fascinated the faithful for 2000 years—from the wooden cross and iron nails to the crown of thorns. But do these sacred artefacts still exist?

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1)
programme.desc: Two thieves dressed as fake cops make off with a half-billion dollars' worth of world-class artwork from a Boston museum. Although the paintings remain missing, numerous suspects turn up dead.

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: From Evel Knievel to Harry Houdini, host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten daredevils of all time, as voted by a panel of experts. Which of these record-breaking junkies gets your heart pumping?

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths enter the forge to compete in a Forged in Fire first: the Knife Fight. Arriving with their best blades in hand, competitors will immediately be put to the test and one will be eliminated.

programme.title: Lingerie
programme.desc: Get to know the intimate side of FashionTV. silk, lace and everything seductive, bringing you the best in photo shoots, fashion shows and more.

programme.title: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator
programme.desc: After living a life full of vices, women and violence, Boyong Mañalac decided to turn his life around and mend his ways by taking after his father, an upright police officer. Boyong Mañalac personify the ideals of integrity and service to his countrymen.

programme.title: Segurista
programme.desc: Made destitute by the eruption of Mount Pinatubo in Central Luzon, Karen decides to work as an insurance underwriter by day and as a guest relation’s officer in a club by night.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: Kumander Bawang
programme.desc: Herbert Bautista comes from a family of vampire killers. The male heirs reek with the stench of garlic and are endowed with super powers. There is a need for Kumander Bawang and is off to fight the vampire.

programme.title: Codename: Palaban
programme.desc: Coming from different social backgrounds and of different ideologies, this group of women are made to undergo special training course in exchange for suspended jail sentences.

programme.title: Carding Estrabel: Tirador ng Malabon
programme.desc: One of the heroes that emerged during the Japanese occupation was the soldier-killer Carding (Dante Varona). After the war, Carding became a policeman and as such, continued his work of ridding the force of its corrupt elements.

programme.title: Ang Kuya Kong Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Isinakdal Ko Ang Aking Ina
programme.desc: Can a mother forsake her child? She is a doctor, who almost has everything but despite her wealth, she is not happy. Unknown to her, the son she’s looking for is the very man who has been driving her around.

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matinik Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Humanap Ka Ng Panget (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Andrew E made his acting debut in this wacky comedy based on his big hit "Humanap Ka ng Panget". The message of the song is that if you want to be happy it is best to fall in love with an ugly woman or man who will be grateful for your love and will do anything you want.

programme.title: The Greatest Hits The Reunion
programme.desc: The New Minstrels and the Circus Band are two legendary show bands that dominated the local entertainment circuit in the 70s. Prepare for an evening of R&B, disco, rock, funk, romantic ballads and other great sounds from the 70s.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: Philanthropist and financier David Rubenstein uncovers inside stories from the most influential minds in business.

programme.desc: Renowned financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein talks with the world's most successful investors, who share their investing strategies and tactics.

programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When three construction emergencies break out all over town, Blaze must save the day by becoming: Tool Truck Blaze! With a toolbox full of amazing tools, Blaze is ready to hammer, drill and saw through any obstacle in his way! Tool Truck Power!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda! // During Cap’n Turbot's archaeological dig, a rock slide unearths a big dinosaur bone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window. // Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew

programme.desc: The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.desc: Boots and Dora journey to Banana Hill to bring Isa a Friendiversary gift - a flowerpot that Boots painted himself! // Dora and friends throw Swiper a surprise birthday party. On the way to the party, Swiper attempts to swipe his own surprise present.

programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today is George’s birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.desc: Kevin puts contestants through the ringer to see which hacks work best to crack open an oyster.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 3
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test user-submitted hacks to see which one will bring flowers back from the dead.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 4
programme.desc: Kevin hacks a fancy chandelier out of plastic spoons and he spills the tea on hacks that casinos use to hustle you.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 5
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke use the power of the sun to hack a juicy burger.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 6
programme.desc: Kevin reveals a gas mask hack that will help you during a zombie apocalypse.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 7
programme.desc: Brooke turns an ex's bad taste in vinyl records into a fun candy bowl.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 8
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin go head-to-head testing out hacks to make your pool party the event of the year.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 9
programme.desc: Go hack to the future to cope with some emotional hacks.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 10
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke learn at-home exercise hacks from Good Housekeeping. Plus, Kevin judges a granny vs. granny hack battle.

programme.title: Arrow S2 23
programme.desc: As Slade's soldiers attack the city, Oliver rallies his team and Felicity gets a call from S.T.A.R. Labs with game-changing news. Thea comes face to face with Malcolm Merlyn.

programme.title: Arrow S2 24
programme.desc: In the Season Two Finale, Oliver must decide once and for all whether he's a killer or a hero when Slade moves forward with his plan to kill one more person in Oliver's life.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Take a ride on the dumb side! TruTV is counting down the 20 most moronic motorheads ever caught on tape. You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: It's lights, camera, action on 20 of the most pinheaded performers ever to take the stage. From lion trainers under attack, to a sexy drum solo and a guy famous for smoking weed. They all share the spotlight with our cast of hilarious comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Britt!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Get your credit cards ready, because TruTV is coming at you with 20 all new inventions that will both horrify and delight! We've got a loop to make pooping in the woods even more exciting, a way to cool your man parts for optimal baby making, and asound system for the great beyond that will blow the lid off of your coffin. Supplies may be limited, but the jokes from our cast sure aren't, featuring Judy Gold, Jared Logan, and Bryan Callen.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 4
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr are forced to think on their feet at a podiatrist's office, ask strangers for help burying unusual items in the park, and keep their eyes on the prize in a grocery store race.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 5
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr test their comedic timing on strangers in the park, promote office safety to stunned employees, and dabble in online dating with humiliating profiles created by the other Jokers.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 6
programme.desc: The Jokers are challenged to hold in their laughter during presentations designed to crack them up. Plus, when Joe, Sal, and Murr try to gang up on Q, he turns the tables.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 7
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr strike out with patrons in a bowling alley and try to force-feed unsuspecting diners. Plus, a surprise visit by Rosie O'Donnell has tonight's loser seeing double.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 8
programme.desc: The Jokers give each other humiliating tasks to complete on the mall escalator, ask absurd survey questions at the zoo and are forced to whisper sweet nothings to grocery store patrons. Plus, tonight's losers are the surprise opening act for ImagineDragons and must perform for 14,000 disappointed music fans.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 20
programme.desc: Which cop show had a major influence on Hack 911? What were early ice skates made out of? Which old wives' tale is actually true? And which hack did Kevin and Brooke think was a prank? We've got all that and more on Inside Hacks!

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: Friends S5 8
programme.desc: It's Thanksgiving, and the gang remembers former terrible Thanksgiving experiences. Chandler tells Monica that he loves her.

programme.title: Friends S5 9
programme.desc: Ross becomes upset when someone at work takes his sandwich from the refrigerator and eats it. Joey finds himself in a terrible mess when he tries to cover for Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Friends S5 10
programme.desc: Phoebe collects money for the Salvation Army during the holidays. A bored Ross creates havoc in Joey and Chandler's lives. Rachel is disturbed by her date's inappropriate relationship with his sister.

programme.title: Friends S5 11
programme.desc: The friends all make New Year's resolutions, but it looks like Rachel's resolution – to stop gossiping – is going to be the hardest to keep when she finds out about Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Friends S5 12
programme.desc: Chandler's behavior toward his boss annoys Monica. Ross' latest romance astounds everyone.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 3
programme.desc: Four containers, straight from the Big Apple, make their way to Long Beach, CA. A can full of broken dummies generates some serious buzz, while a billionaire's unclaimed goods have everyone seeing dollar signs. Plus, a one-of-a-kind auction that includes the container itself.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 4
programme.desc: Bidders go head to head in a battle over some super heavyweight freight, a can filled to the brim with outdoor adventure equipment contains a unique surprise, and a tailgaters dream could stop its winner short of the goal line.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 5
programme.desc: The Israelis' go hard after what they think is vintage clothing, but will their fashion expertise pay off? Mo and Ty go postal when the doors swing open to reveal some mysterious machinery, and a custom container could land at least one buyer behindbars.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 6
programme.desc: The auction turns into a circus when four containers bound for Russia's Winter Games miss the boat. A waterlogged container piques everyone's interest, but can anything inside be salvaged? Plus, a Major League Baseball player gives Mo & Ty the lowdown on a state-of-the art piece of gym equipment

programme.title: Container Wars S3 7
programme.desc: The Israelis hang ten on a sweet beach can, but one surprise item may send them off the lot in search of major dollars. Plus, Jason strikes on a container full of wood and weird gear, but will his investment land him in the gutter? And later, a mystery door may check one team into a big loss.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 11
programme.desc: Sheldon unwillingly revisits some Christmas memories during a lively game of Dungeons and Dragons, while Raj joins the girls for ladies night out.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 12
programme.desc: Sheldon is accused of sexual harassment at the University and winds up dragging Leonard, Raj and Howard into the fray.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 13
programme.desc: Leonard's car is stolen when the guys take a road trip to a comic book convention in Bakersfield, dressed as Star Trek characters.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 14
programme.desc: Outraged that he’s being forced to work with university nemesis, Barry Kripke, Sheldon faces a crisis of conscience. Howard and Raj spend a thousand dollars on action figures of themselves.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 22
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 15
programme.desc: A fight between Leonard and Sheldon drives Leonard to finally move in with Penny – not realizing how the shift will affect Penny and Amy’s living arrangements.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: Feel the endorphin rush as 20 of the World's Dumbest Thrillseekers do their thing. We've got a motorcycle crash, an out of control skydiver, even an angry bison. And one thing ties them all together - outrageous fails. With hair-raising commentary from our cast of comedians, including Michael O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: A man who dumps his long-time girlfriend discovers his ex is a superhero, and she's out for revenge.

programme.title: Seven
programme.desc: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears...

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: The last new participant, Kendra, embeds while Orion loses his cool with a CO. Accusations of stealing lead to chaos within the women's pod, and one participant seemingly gives up on the mission.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: In Gwinnett County, a beloved special education teacher is gunned down in broad daylight when the suspects' plan to score some easy money spins out of control.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Two boys find their mother in the back of her car, Tulsa detectives turn to her family for help catching her killer. But the defendant's testimony leaves the prosecution's case hanging.

programme.title: Malaysian Drug Mules
programme.desc: Follow the Royal Malaysian Police as they go in pursuit of sinister Nigerian gangs who deceive or coerce hundreds of Malaysian women into smuggling drugs.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The investigation focuses on a white guy with a white pickup truck. Ann Bryan is found murdered at the St. James Place retirement community. Despite attempts to catch her killer, the case goes cold.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: From the perspective of the person being arrested, viewers get a firsthand understanding of what truly happens once the handcuffs are on and the justice system begins its process.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A judge sounds off on a mother charged with assaulting her own daughter; a man convicted of robbery becomes physically ill after downing a mystery drink; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A handcuffed defendant attempts a bold escape from the courtroom; a judge gets cursed at when an arraignment goes off the rails; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. Two senior citizens get locked up for trespassing while trapping stray cats; a man is arrested after pouring milk on his head.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A suspect flees from a high-speed car chase while carrying her infant child. State troopers catch a man with a stolen utility pole strapped to the roof of his car.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: The family of Miya Marcano share the agonising details of what happened around the beautiful 19-year-old's disappearance.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Travel blogger Carla Stefaniak went to Costa Rica to celebrate her 36th birthday. But when she was to arrive back home to Miami, her awaiting loved ones realised she never got on the plane.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Feisty Chiquita Tate grew up determined to make something of herself after being raised in poverty by a drug-addicted mom. Now a hard-working lawyer, the only thing missing in her life is a man.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers; a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: What begins as an open-and-shut case spins into a full-on investigation when a mother and son are found dead in their home. Was this a murder/suicide, or could someone else have been responsible?

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover ATF and DEA agents are reminded to never judge a book by its cover and to always be on their toes. Even small-time suspects have the potential to unleash terror.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When two separate cases run cold for women who have been abducted and murdered, it takes the courage of a third unsuspecting victim to unveil a killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: The remaining participants encounter obstacles while trying to fulfil their missions as drugs run rampant throughout PCDC, resulting in a full shakedown.

programme.title: Meurtres À Porquerolles
programme.desc: The lifeless body of a sixty year-old woman is found on Porquerolles' Alycastre beach. It's rapidly identified as Élisabeth Carlson, an artist much-admired on the island. The locally-born deputy public prosecutor, Arnaud Taillard, heads the investigation with Charlie Landowski, a somewhat whimsical detective inspector who's just been transferred from Seine-Saint-Denis.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Les Maîtres Du Piment
programme.desc: Whether they come from Espelette, Korea or the West Indies, chilli peppers have very different personalities. Even if they seem similar, each has their own unique taste and heat level. From India to Thailand, the chefs reveal their secrets to showcase a veritable wealth of flavour.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Terriennes
programme.desc: The ''Terriennes'' portal: a site in French on the status of women around the world. The site: www.tv5monde.com/terriennes

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Roumanie, Le Charme Des Balkans
programme.desc: On the southern fringes of Eastern Europe, francophone and francophile, Romania remains little known. Yet, in the heart of its sublime landscapes, its people have succeeded in keeping their culture and traditions alive. From architectural heritage to natural parks, Romania is a land of untold surprises to explore.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: A single mother is beaten and then killed. Her death could be linked to the dubious activities of her 17-year old son Enzo. But the investigation reveals that the victim was actually a violent alcoholic who exploited her son to pay her gambling debts.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Over and above the familial environment, the investigators explore the lead of loan sharks. Deeply in debt, the victim had been seeking short-term solutions with some very dodgy characters. However, none of them would have anything to gain from her death.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Steeped in Japanese culture and his passion for it, Jean-Michel Letellier is a virtuoso, an artist extending the limits of paper as a material, in search of boundaries he says has not yet reached after many years of exploration.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Mouse replaces Ox on the basketball court, which could well turn the whole match on its head...

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy, Les Infos Noisettes
programme.desc: How do bees make honey? What do mushrooms do at the foot of trees? Why is there always water running in the river? Edmond and Lucy try to discover the fascinating world around them thanks to Edouard and his encyclopaedia.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Félix, Manolo and Lounis have formed a band to take part in a talent competition, but Manolo isn't much of a drummer and Lounis has a serious problem with stage fright.

programme.title: Ernest Et Célestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Célestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Roland-Garros - Bâtir La Légende
programme.desc: Hénin, Evert, Wilander, Chang, Kuerten, Nadal... To coincide with the modernisation of the Roland-Garros Stadium, begun in 2016, legendary champions look back at their achievements, their feelings, their emotions, what the clay courts of Roland-Garros mean for each of them and the ambiance that reigns in this unique venue.

programme.title: Roland-Garros - 40 Ans D'Exploits
programme.desc: Roland-Garros, a legendary tournament where some of the greatest pages of world tennis were written, legends born and dreams became reality. A look back at some of the most emblematic moments of the last forty years.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: The Arvida heritage site in Saguenay is home to houses which tell a whole story. Gatineau matchstick houses are becoming increasingly rare. And we discover the talent of a carpenter consultant on heritage.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. programme.title: Divertissement

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Gabon, L'Écrin Vert De L'Afrique
programme.desc: In the heart of Equatorial Africa, Gabon is a real paradise for nature lovers. With its primary forests, beaches lined with palm trees and national parks full of exceptional fauna, the country offers one of the greatest levels of biodiversity on the continent and preserves its rich ancestral traditions.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.desc: Created in 1914, this national park is the oldest Swiss park and is found in Engadine, in the canton of the Grisons. It is crisscrossed by a vast network of footpaths covering 100 kilometres and is an ideal place to contemplate nature, but be sure to take a map.
